column2: ['Level 10 left talent: +150 health increased to +175.', 'Level 10 right talent changed: +15 movement speed -> -30  Epicenter attack speed slow.', 'Level 15 left talent changed: -40  Epicenter attack speed slow -> +2  Epicenter pulses.', 'Level 20 left talent changed: +3  Epicenter pulses -> +25  Epicenter damage per pulse.', 'Talents:']

['Now reduces attack speed by 15/20/25/30 as well.', 'Increased slow duration from 3 on each level to 3/3.5/4/4.5.', ' Caustic Finale\nNow reduces attack speed by 15/20/25/30 as well.\nIncreased slow duration from 3 on each level to 3/3.5/4/4.5.', 'Increased  Epicenter damage per pulse from 110 to 110/120/130.']
['Increased base attack speed from 100 to 110.']
[" Sand Storm's blind now uses pseudo-random distribution."]

['Increased base  intelligence from 16 to 19.']

['Increased mana cost from 60/50/40/30 to 60 on each level.', 'Increased cooldown from 34/28/22/16 to 40/32/24/16.', ' Sand Storm\nIncreased mana cost from 60/50/40/30 to 60 on each level.\nIncreased cooldown from 34/28/22/16 to 40/32/24/16.']

['Reduced base health regeneration from 1.5 to 0.', 'Reduced base mana regeneration from 0.9 to 0.', ' Sand Storm
No longer requires channeling. It now ends when Sand King leaves the area.
While inside the area, attacking or casting spells now reveals Sand King for 0.7 seconds.
Rescaled radius from 525 on each level to 350/450/550/650.
Reduced damage per second from 40/60/80/100 to 25/50/75/100.
Increased cooldown from 34/26/18/10 to 34/28/22/16.
Reduced duration from 50 on each level to 20/25/30/35.', 'No longer requires channeling. It now ends when Sand King leaves the area.', 'While inside the area, attacking or casting spells now reveals Sand King for 0.7 seconds.', 'Rescaled radius from 525 on each level to 350/450/550/650.', 'Reduced damage per second from 40/60/80/100 to 25/50/75/100.', 'Increased cooldown from 34/26/18/10 to 34/28/22/16.', 'Reduced duration from 50 on each level to 20/25/30/35.', ' Epicenter
No longer pierces spell immunity.
The radius now increases by 50 per pulse on each pulse, instead of sometimes by 25 and sometimes 75.
Radius of each pulse from 275/325/375/425/475/525/575/650/675/700/725/750/775/800 to 275/325/375/425/475/525/575/625/675/725/775/825/875/925.', 'No longer pierces spell immunity.', 'The radius now increases by 50 per pulse on each pulse, instead of sometimes by 25 and sometimes 75.
Radius of each pulse from 275/325/375/425/475/525/575/650/675/700/725/750/775/800 to 275/325/375/425/475/525/575/625/675/725/775/825/875/925.', 'Talents:']
['Increased  Burrowstrike cooldown from 11 on each level to 14/13/12/11.']
['Reduced base attack damage from 25-41 to 25-35.', 'Reduced  Caustic Finale movement speed slow from 21%/24%/27%/30% to 15%/20%/25%/30%.']
['Level 10 right talent: +30 movement speed reduced to +25.', 'Reduced  Caustic Finale movement speed slow from 30% on each level to 21%/24%/27%/30%.', 'Talents:']
[' Caustic Finale no longer applies its area effects when the debuffed target gets denied by the enemy, or when the target expires if it was a summon.']
['Reduced base armor from 0 to -1.', 'Reduced movement speed from 290 to 285.']
['Reduced movement speed from 295 to 290.', 'Reduced  Burrowstrike stun duration from 2.17 on each level to 1.9/2/2.1/2.2.']
['Reduced  Burrowstrike damage from 100/160/220/280 to 85/150/215/280.']

['Level 10: +5 armor or +10% magic resistance', 'Level 15: +50  Epicenter attack speed slow or +50  Sand Storm damage per second', 'Level 20: +120 gold per minute or +350 health', 'Level 25: +4  Epicenter pulses or +50 health regen', 'Increased base health regeneration from 0 to 1.5.', 'Increased base mana regeneration from 0.01 to 0.9.', 'Reworked talents:']
[' Caustic Finale now deals a fixed 20/50/80/110 damage upon expiring, instead of being 50% of the death explosion damage. [?]']

['Level 15 left talent changed: -30s respawn time -> +50  Epicenter attack speed slow.', 'Increased  strength gain from 2.6 to 2.9.', 'Reduced base health regeneration from 0.25 to 0.', ' Sand Storm\nReduced invisibility linger duration from 1.5 on each level from 0.9/1.1/1.3/1.5.\nIncreased damage from 25/50/75/100 to 40/60/80/100.', 'Reduced invisibility linger duration from 1.5 on each level from 0.9/1.1/1.3/1.5.', 'Increased damage from 25/50/75/100 to 40/60/80/100.', ' Caustic Finale is no longer a unique attack modifier.', 'Talents:']

['Level 10: +5 armor or +200 mana', 'Level 15: +15 movement speed or +12% magic resistance', 'Level 20: +120 gold per minute or +350 health', 'Level 25: +4  Epicenter pulses or +50 health regen', ' Burrowstrike can no longer be cast while rooted.', " Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Burrowstrike no longer applies  Caustic Finale on illusions.", 'Added talents:']
['Reduced base movement speed from 300 to 295.']
['Reduced  Sand Storm cooldown from 40/30/20/10 to 34/26/18/10.', 'Reduced  Epicenter mana cost from 175/250/325 to 150/225/300.']
['Increased base  strength from 21 to 22.', 'Reduced  Epicenter cooldown from 140/120/100 to 120/110/100.']
['Increased attack range from 128 to 150.', 'Rescaled  Sand Storm max channel time from 20/40/60/80 to 50 on each level.']

['Increased base  strength from 18 to 21.', " Aghanim's Scepter\nNo longer upgrades  Epicenter (upgrade was, increases pulse count from 6/8/10 to 8/10/12 and reduces cooldown from 140/120/100 to 120/100/80).\nNow doubles  Burrowstrike's range and makes it apply  Caustic Finale on hit enemy heroes.", 'No longer upgrades  Epicenter (upgrade was, increases pulse count from 6/8/10 to 8/10/12 and reduces cooldown from 140/120/100 to 120/100/80).', "Now doubles  Burrowstrike's range and makes it apply  Caustic Finale on hit enemy heroes.", 'Increased  Caustic Finale slow from 25% to 30%.']

['Increased expire damage from 30% to 50% of explosion damage.', 'Increased slow from 20% to 25%.', ' Caustic Finale\nIncreased expire damage from 30% to 50% of explosion damage.\nIncreased slow from 20% to 25%.']

['Now always triggers the explosion (via unit death or when the debuff expires). If triggered by expiring, it deals 30% of the damage.', 'Multiple attacks on the same target no longer refresh the debuff.', 'Now slows all damaged units by 20% for 3 seconds.', 'Reduced debuff duration from 8 to 6.', ' Caustic Finale
Now always triggers the explosion (via unit death or when the debuff expires). If triggered by expiring, it deals 30% of the damage.
Multiple attacks on the same target no longer refresh the debuff.
Now slows all damaged units by 20% for 3 seconds.
Reduced debuff duration from 8 to 6.']
['Fixed  Epicenter to support multiple instances at the same time (e.g. via  Refresher Orb).']
['Increased  Sand Storm radius from 275/325/375/525 to 525 on each level.']
['Increased  Sand Storm damage increased from 20/40/60/80 to 25/50/75/100.', 'Increased  Epicenter attack speed slow from 10 to 30.']

['Increased invisibility linger duration from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.5 to 1.5.', 'Reduced damage interval from 1 to 0.5 and reduced damage accordingly to keep the same overall damage.', ' Sand Storm\nIncreased invisibility linger duration from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.5 to 1.5.\nReduced damage interval from 1 to 0.5 and reduced damage accordingly to keep the same overall damage.']
[" Epicenter's slow is no longer blocked by spell immunity.", 'Increased  Caustic Finale debuff duration from 2 to 8.']

['Reduced collision size from 24 to 12.']

['Increased base armor from -3 to -2 (total armor is now 0.66).']
['Fixed various glitches caused by  Sand Storm with  Spectral Dagger and  Black Hole']

['Reduced base armor from 0 to -3 (total armor is now -0.34).', 'Fixed a control issue when casting  Burrowstrike.', ' Sand Storm\nFixed Sand Storm,  Rot and  Storm Seeker from not being able to affect the same area at the same time.\nFixed not affecting sleeping units.', 'Fixed Sand Storm,  Rot and  Storm Seeker from not being able to affect the same area at the same time.', 'Fixed not affecting sleeping units.']
['Fixed  Burrowstrike affecting Juggernaut during  Blade Fury.', 'Fixed a bug between  Voodoo Restoration and Burrowstrike.']

['No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time.', "No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Sand King's starting point.", 'No longer conflicts with  Earth Spike,  Impale,  Ravage and Burrowstrikes from other Sand Kings.', 'No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when the targeted point was a cliff.', "Recoded  Burrowstrike:
No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time.
No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Sand King's starting point.
No longer conflicts with  Earth Spike,  Impale,  Ravage and Burrowstrikes from other Sand Kings.
No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when the targeted point was a cliff.", ' Sand Storm

['Reduced  Burrowstrike damage from 80/160/240/340 to 100/160/220/280.', 'Increased  Caustic Finale damage radius from 250 to 400.']
['Recoded  Sand Storm to improve lags.']
['Increased  Sand Storm damage from 5/10/15/20 to 10/20/30/40.']
['Slight improvements to  Sand Storm to fix lag.']
['Changed  Burrowstrike hotkey from B to E.']

['Reduced mana cost from 60 to 60/50/40/30', 'Reduced channeling time from infinite to 20/40/60/80 (the invisibility and area damage already lasted 20/40/60/80 seconds, this fixes the channeling to end when the effects do).', 'Slightly improved to fix lag.', ' Sand Storm
Reduced mana cost from 60 to 60/50/40/30
Reduced channeling time from infinite to 20/40/60/80 (the invisibility and area damage already lasted 20/40/60/80 seconds, this fixes the channeling to end when the effects do).
Slightly improved to fix lag.']

['Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.', 'Max channel time: 20/40/60/80', 'Radius: 200/250/300/350', 'Damage per second: 5/10/15/20', 'Invisibility linger duration: 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.2', 'Mana cost: 60', 'Cooldown: 40/35/30/25', 'Notes: When the ability gets canceled by move orders or disables, Sand King remains invisible for a short while still, but the damage stops immediately. The visuel effects linger as well.', 'Replaced Entrench with  Sand Storm.']

['Sand King can no longer buy  Desolator.', ' Burrowstrike\nFixed being able to cast while silenced.\nFixed some other minor bugs.', 'Fixed being able to cast while silenced.', 'Fixed some other minor bugs.', 'Fixed Entrench so that multiple Sand Kings can use it at the same time.', 'Replaced Dust Trail with Sand Storm']

['Increased hero stun duration from 1.5 to 2.17.', 'Reduced non-hero stun duration from 3 to 2.17.', ' Burrowstrike\nIncreased hero stun duration from 1.5 to 2.17.\nReduced non-hero stun duration from 3 to 2.17.', 'Reduced Entrench and Unentrench mana cost from 63 to 55.', 'Increased  Epicenter damage per pulse from 70 to 125.']

['Fixed not going on cooldown when directly targeting a unit with it.', "Now uses 0.3 second cast time, like Sandking's other abilities.", " Burrowstrike\nFixed not going on cooldown when directly targeting a unit with it.\nNow uses 0.3 second cast time, like Sandking's other abilities."]
